content:
Our little bubble world
has already brought so many unexpected surprises.
I wonder what sights await in the other bubble worlds?

I used to worry about troubling Sani when going out,
wondering if she'd get too tired,
but now with the Lumia Bottle, those worries are gone~

Stepping on Lumia to encounter beautyâ€”
That's the most romantic take on adventure I've ever heard!
I've got another goal for collecting Joy Rice now!
